GeneDef.label: post-regrow
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can regrow genes instantly after using the reimplanter by absorbing genes from the target, which increases the duration of gene regrowth in their victims.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Using a <color=#8a8ae6>post-implanter or implanter</color> removes genes regrowing, but increases the target's genes regrowing for the same amount of time.
